sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The boke of Magna Carta with diuers other statutes, whose names appere in the nexte lefe folowynge, translated into Englyshe. Laws, etc. England. Ferrers, George, 1500?-1579. England.
[4], 193 [i.e. 194], [6] leaves
In Fletestrete, by me Robert Redman, dwellyng at the sygne of the George, nexte to Saynt Dunstones church], [Imprynted at London : Anno D[omi]ni. 1534.
Translated by George Ferrers, whose name appears on the colophon leaf. Includes the text of part 1 of STC 9271 only. Printer's name and address from colophon. Leaf 194 misnumbered 193. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Translated by George Ferrers, whose name appears on the colophon leaf. Includes the text of part 1 of STC 9271 only. Printer's name and address from colophon. Leaf 194 misnumbered 193. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
